item.title: ‘The Gilded Age’ Star Denée Benton Talks Peggy’s Epic Cinderella Moment and How a Season 4 Wedding Could Play Out
item.description: Benton talks to THR after the season three finale, reflecting on key moments in Peggy and Dr. Kirkland’s beloved courtship.

item.title: Ben Ahlers on Being a ‘Gilded Age’ Tech Bro and His Fashion World Cred (He’s 6-Foot-2!)
item.description: The breakout butler of HBO’s historical hit says “there’s something so inherently theatrical” about playing with style.
